content:
Sarah is transferring the drawing below of a triangular roof to a coordinate plane. She plots point $A$ at $(-6, 3)$ and point $B$ at $(-1, 6)$. The length of the base of the roof is $9$ units in length.

**Plot points $A, B,$ and $C$.**

![](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/22ea0963f6d6d445dc4b7bba2f81694f01bc9003.png)  

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
